text: @ezraklein You're delusional:#Trump closed the borders to China @TheDemocrats went ballistic calling him racist. The HEALTH supervisor in NYC Tweeted they weren't going to 'buy into @realDonaldTrump conspiracy about #COVID19' @SpeakerPelosi was in Chinatown 24 Feb telling EVERYONE to come!
